cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on November 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2385, Justice for Women Veterans Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 61 (Thursday, April 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BROWNLEY:
H.R. 2385.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution
[Page H1720]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Justice for Women Veterans Act
